title: Singed random healing bug
body:
Ok To start off I have mained {{champion:27}}  for 3 years and ive seen it all, over the past 4 months Ive noticed a bug that happens after using  gas on minions you randomly start getting +20 20 20 hp for 5 seconds, this happens every so often (not every time you you gas on minions). But i think this might be a little bit unfair so I was wondering can it be patched?.

Also prehaps a new {{champion:27}}  skin?

:D

replies.body: >**DO NOT** post bug reports here. Instead, head on over to our [Report a Bug](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report) board.
